description: Jake Lyons's an awesomely cute pool boy hired to clean the swimming pool at the condo where the guys are staying.Eric Austyn comes outside for a smoke, makes eye contact with Jake and you know what's going to happen next. Damon's away, so Eric takes Jake up to the bedroom and fucks his tight little ass.
title: CitiBoyz 56: 'My Summer Vacation', Scene #02
